title: Persons & Problems in the Contemporary World: Collaborative Inquiry
capp:
CORE 1000; CORE 1500*; Minimum Earned Credits of 60

* Concurrent enrollment allowed.
registration_restrictions:
Enrollment is limited to Undergraduate level students.

Enrollment limited to students in the Schl for Professional Studies college.

Students in the Madrid, Spain campus may not enroll.
description: This course is part of the Saint Louis University Core, an integrated intellectual experience completed by all baccalaureate students, regardless of major, program, college, school or campus. The Core offers all SLU students the same unified approach to Jesuit education guided by SLU’s institutional mission and identity and our nine undergraduate.
